issue.title: Animation works on iOS but looks strange on Android
issue.body:
Hi,
This animation (attached)  
[coffeanim.zip](https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-react-native/files/1616125/coffeanim.zip)

works perfectly on iOS, but behaves really strangle on Android.
Could you guys possibly give us an idea as to why?

Kind Regards,
Dustyn

body: @dustynl  can fix this bug by modify generated json file?

issue.title: Fix rotations on solid layers

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body:
Prior to this, the transform matrix got mapped to a solid layer's bounds. However, if there is a rotation then the final shape won't be a rect so we need to map the points instead.

Fixes #587

issue.title: Fix rotations on solid layers
